about_the_game: This is the original soundtrack for Sneebles The Half Cat, featuring catchy, upbeat melodies that match its fast-paced and frantic gameplay. Also included are the 90s cartoon-inspired musical scores for cutscenes - all crafted and presented in the spirit of the 16-bit home console era!
detailed_description: This is the original soundtrack for Sneebles The Half Cat, featuring catchy, upbeat melodies that match its fast-paced and frantic gameplay. Also included are the 90s cartoon-inspired musical scores for cutscenes - all crafted and presented in the spirit of the 16-bit home console era!
